segments.text: I see the chaos brewing in this domestic scene, and it feels overwhelming.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so focused on that plate, yet danger lurks all around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Is she truly happy in her bubble, or is she just ignoring the mess?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That boy could fall and hit his head at any moment; it terrifies me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How could she not see that? It’s like ignoring a ticking time bomb.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl’s hand is stretched out so hopefully, and it breaks my heart.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could reach out and warn them, but I’m just a silent observer.
segments.speaker: PAR
